head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GALLAY, BARBARA CLAAR

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GALLAY, BARBARA CLAAR

block.p: GALLAY-Barbara Claar. Devoted wife of Samuel Gallay and the late Morris Claar. Loving mother of Alice Claar and the late Sheldon. Adored grandmother of Nancy Hochman, Courtney Claar and Jamie Claar. Service Monday, 2PM, Temple Israel Cemetery, Hastings-on-Hudson. Contributions to the ALS Association of Greater New York, 116 John St, Suite 1304, NYC 10038, would be appreciated.
